|802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = default |defaultssid_regex = ^default$ |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt (Was), Tomato, TomatoUSB |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 03/27/2006 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0018CZZG8 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = ASUS WL-120g v2A |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4318E;BCM4318EKFBG, HS0547, P20, 760839, N1; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 9 |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Default settings (including the SSID) are per '''ASUS''''s manual. [[ASUS WL-500gP v1/de|de]] ==Links of Interest== *[[ASUS WL-500gP v1|Asus WL-500g Premium]] (in English) *[[ASUS WL-500gP v1/de|Asus WL-500g Premium]] (in German) *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/wl500gp ''ASUS WL-500gP'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asus_routers ''Asus'' routers on '''Wikipedia'''] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=542&num=1 Review on '''Phoronix'''] :00:17:3F OUI on the label, presumed to be used for both interfaces *[https://www.overclockers.ru/lab/23627/ASUS_WL-500g_Premium_bolshe_chem_prosto_router.html Review on '''Overclockers'''] (RU) *[https://geektimes.ru/post/256404/ ''Moding Asus WL-500gP'' on '''Geektimes'''] (RU) ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=2507 HowTo: unbrick a WL500g Deluxe and a WL500g Premium] *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?5593-Photo-of-Asus-WL500g-Premium-MB-with-covers-removed-and-chips-specs ''Photo of Asus WL-500g Premium'' on '''wl500g.info'''] *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?14170-Exploring-WL500gP-hardware-expansion-interfacing-possibilities ''Asus WL-500gP Hardware Mod'' on '''wl500g.info''']
